member.name: M:Economic.DllEntry.RvExtensionVersion(System.Text.StringBuilder,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets called when arma starts up and loads all extension. It's perfect to load in static objects in a seperate thread so that the extension doesn't needs any seperate initalization
member.param: The string builder object that contains the result of the function
The maximum size of bytes that can be returned

member.name: M:Economic.DllEntry.RvExtension(System.Text.StringBuilder,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: The entry point for the default callExtension command.
member.param: The string builder object that contains the result of the function
The maximum size of bytes that can be returned
The string argument that is used along with callExtension

member.name: M:Economic.DllEntry.RvExtensionArgs(System.Text.StringBuilder,System.Int32,System.String,System.String[],System.Int32)
member.summary: The entry point for the callExtensionArgs command.
member.param: The string builder object that contains the result of the function
The maximum size of bytes that can be returned
The string argument that is used along with callExtension
The args passed to callExtension as a string array
The size of the string array args
